metadata.title: CVE-2019-7329 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, as the form action on multiple views utilizes $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] insecurely, mishandling any arbitrary input appended to the webroot URL, without any proper filtration, leading to XSS.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
